page.title: 10SPARE TIME IN MILVERTON
page.content:
MILVERTON SCHOOL FETE WAS ON SUNDAY, 16TH JUNE. THERE WERE LOTS OF STALLS. THERE WAS A BOTTLE TOP STALL AND A REFRESHMENT STALL. THERE WAS A FANCY DRESS COMPETITION. I THOUGHT ALL THE COSTUMES WERE UNUSUAL. THE GIRL WHO WON THE CUP WAS DRESSED AS A PEDLAR WOMAN. SHE HAD A TRAY FULL OF NECKLACES AND RIBBONS. IT WAS A NICE SUNNY DAY AND QUITE A FEW PEOPLE WENT. ALL THE STALLS WERE COLOURFUL.
ON SATURDAY, 29TH JUNE, I WENT TO THE CHURCH FETE. THERE WERE SOME ANIMALS THERE. I SAW A BIG, BLACK RAT AND TWO GERBILS. AFTER THAT I WENT AND BOUGHT A DRINK OF ORANGE SQUASH. THEN THE BROWNIES DID SOME EXCELLENT COUNTRY DANCING. MY SISTER AND HER FRIENDS DEMONSTRATED HIGH JUMPS. SOON I WENT HOME ON MY BIKE. THERE WERE LOTS OF THINGS TO DO AT THE FETE.
